answers.answer: Hi,What antibiotics have you been taking and for what indication?Any underlying systemic disorders like diabetes , hypertension , vascular problems?Discuss with your physician prescriber regarding the medications that you are taking.Do not stop or taper any medications unless you have informed you physician about this.Keep us posted regarding your physician's advice.
